contentList.content: When you make an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedStrike_Monk">Unarmed Strike</LSTag> against an opponent, you may spend 3 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag> to leave them under the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Silence</LSTag> for 9 turns.
